Terrorsaur/Quickstrike/Megatron:





Terrorsaur dodged Autfire's shot, then was hit from Atrax sneak attack. He 
hit the ground on his chest. He groaned and lifted his head slowly from the 
ground.



Quickstrike froze. His optics widened. "Sugar-bot?" He slowly turned his 
head to Dark Mouse. He glowered, not liking this situation. But Megatron 
didn't say it was going to be easy.



Megatron suddenly saw the auto-guns come on-line. His optics widened. He 
leaped out of the way and ran to the side of the ship. He transformed to 
robot mode. "I believe it's time for us to talk!" he called out.
